descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Nicolas Batum lobs it up to Dwight Howard who finishes with a two-handed jam early in the first quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Batum, Howard connect for alley-oop slam) 2018/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Batum, Howard connect for alley-oop slam

videos.description: Dwight Howard swats Michael Beasley's shot attempt and Jarret Jack swats it right back to him from the bench.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Knicks' bench reacts to Howard's block) 2018/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Knicks' bench reacts to Howard's block

videos.description: Kyle O'Quinn dishes over three defenders and finds Isaiah Hicks who throws down an easy two-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Nice pass by O'Quinn leads to Hicks dunk) 2018/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nice pass by O'Quinn leads to Hicks dunk

videos.description: Troy Williams grabs Trey Burke's miss and throws down a mean one-handed slam in the second quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Williams drops tough putback dunk) 2018/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Williams drops tough putback dunk

videos.description: Marvin Williams scores a basket then crashes into the sidelines but somehow the fan doesn't spill his drink.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Fan saves beverage after Williams' collides on sidelines) 2018/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Fan saves beverage after Williams' collides on sidelines

videos.description: Enes Kanter steals the ball, finds Emmanuel Mudiay who sends it right back to him for a nice layup and gets fouled for a chance at a 3-point play.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Kanter shows off on both sides) 2018/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kanter shows off on both sides

videos.description: Frank Ntilikina scores from deep, gets fouled and completes the 4-point play to give the Knicks a 105-67 lead in the fourth quarter.
videos.headline: Ntilikina gets 4-point play opportunity
